entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Fort Severn
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:55 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -14.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Severn Airport 6:36 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -14.9°C
Pressure: 102.3 kPa
Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -16.6°C
Wind: NNW 28 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blizzard developing late this evening. Blowing snow this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 60 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind north 60 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
